attr.title: LISA: The Joyful
attr.desc: LISA: The Joyful is the soul-twisting conclusion to the quirky side-scrolling RPG series, LISA. Explore Olathe in your quest to punish the world that has treated you wrong. Along the way, learn about this strange land, your family, and the monsters/men in power. The world's out to get you… now, get it back.
attr.desc_md: LISA: The Joyful is the soul-twisting conclusion to the quirky side-scrolling RPG series, LISA. Explore Olathe in your quest to punish the world that has treated you wrong. Along the way, learn about this strange land, your family, and the monsters/men in power. The world's out to get you… now, get it back.
attr.inst:
Purchase and download the game from Steam, tested with Windows version. Go the LISA steam directory. Copy all assets within the ''Lisa The Joyful'' folder to the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase and download the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/379310/), tested with Windows version. Go to the LISA steam directory. Copy all assets within the 'Lisa The Joyful' folder to the gamedata folder.

**Note:** This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
